item.title: Sulis add a quote by John Green
item.description: "There are infinite numbers between 0 and 1. There's .1 and .12 and .112 and an infinite collection of others. Of course, there is a bigger infinite set of numbers between 0 and 2, or between 0 and a million. Some infinities are bigger than other infinities. A writer we used to like taught us that. There are days, many of them, when I resent the size of my unbounded set. I want more numbers than I'm likely to get, and God, I want more numbers for Augustus Waters than he got. But, Gus, my love, I cannot tell you how thankful I am for our little infinity. I wouldn't trade it for the world. You gave me a forever within the numbered days, and I'm grateful." -- John Green

item.title: Sulis add a quote by John Green
item.description: "The town was paper, but the memories were not." -- John Green

item.title: Sulis add a quote by John Green
item.description: "As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once." -- John Green

item.title: Sulis add a quote by John Green
item.description: "What is an "instant" death anyway? How long is an instant? Is it one second? Ten? The pain of those seconds must have been awful as her heart burst and her lungs collapsed and there was no air and no blood to her brain and only raw panic. What the hell is instant? Nothing is instant. Instant rice takes five minutes, instant pudding an hour. I doubt that an instant of blinding pain feels particularly instantaneous." -- John Green

item.title: Sulis add a quote by Windhy Puspitadewi
item.description: "Orang yang baca banyak buku kayak kamu dan menguasai sejarah nggak mungkin bodoh. Kamu cuma sial karena hidup di tempat dan waktu yang salah. Tempat dan waktu ketika kamu dianggap bodoh kalau kamu nggak pintar dalam hal yang namanya sains." -- Windhy Puspitadewi

item.title: Sulis add a quote by Windhy Puspitadewi
item.description: "Kalau ada kupu-kupu yang terperangkap di sarang laba-laba, orang cenderung akan menolong kupu-kupu itu walaupun mungkin si laba-laba belum makan selama berhari-hari..Tapi gimana kalau yang terperangkap adalah ulat yang belum jadi kupu-kupu? Orang tetap nolong nggak? Padahal, keduanya sama. Di dunia ini, memang harus cantik supaya ditolong." -- Windhy Puspitadewi

item.title: Sulis add a quote by Lauren Oliver
item.description: "I love you. Remember. They cannot take it" -- Lauren Oliver

item.title: Sulis add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "You love me. Real or not real?" I tell him, "Real." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Sulis add a quote by Dee
item.description: "Pegang tanganku, tapi jangan terlalu erat, karena aku ingin seiring dan bukan digiring.(Spasi)" -- Dee

item.title: Sulis add a quote by Windhy Puspitadewi
item.description: "Aku baca buku karena aku suka, bukan karena aku mengharap suatu penilaian dari orang-orang di sekitar aku. Bukan karena aku ingin dianggap hebat atau pintar atau berpendidikan atau beradab cuma karena udah baca sebuah karya sastra." -- Windhy Puspitadewi

item.title: Sulis add a quote by farida susanty
item.description: "kamu mau bunuh diri?" ya, asal tidak hujan"." -- farida susanty

item.title: Sulis add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Sulis add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If you want your children to be intelligent, read them fairy tales. If you want them to be more intelligent, read them more fairy tales." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Sulis add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The difference between genius and stupidity is; genius has its limits." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Sulis add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Creativity is knowing how to hide your sources" -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Sulis add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Sulis add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I have no special talents. I am only passionately curious." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Sulis add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Sulis add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. The important thing is to not stop questioning." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Sulis add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "You can have it all. Just not all at once." -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: Sulis add a quote by Richelle Mead
item.description: "Only a true best friend can protect you from your immortal enemies." -- Richelle Mead

item.title: Sulis add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Sulis add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "Forbidden to remember, terrified to forget; it was a hard line to walk." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Sulis add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "I don't have the strength to stay away from you anymore" -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Sulis add a quote by Julia Quinn
item.description: "You always get more respect when you don't have a happy ending." -- Julia Quinn

item.title: Sulis add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Sulis add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Sulis add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Sulis add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Sulis add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi
